title: Alpha Bound
description: I used to want nothing more than to escape my destiny.Except escaping wasnâ€™t an option. The fates are a cruel mistress, and running got me nowhere.Rejected. Tormented. Betrayed.With my world under attack from someone I considered family and the one person I thought hated me most standing by me, my entire world is upside down.The pain of rejection was nothing compared to the pain of betrayal.I wanted a choice, and the fates obliged. Fight to reclaim what is meant to be mine or lose everything I never knew I wanted.My destiny is my own. Nothing and no one will take that from me.
author: Sloane Murphy
